display_long_description:
“The GOLF+ VR platform is a forward-thinking way to enjoy the sport that is appealing to gamers and golfers of all levels.” - **PGA TOUR**

[media]

# Includes:

⛳️ Iconic Courses: 3 Free Courses and 25+ real-world destinations available for purchase including Pebble Beach, The Old Course at St Andrews, TPC Sawgrass and more.
[media]

🏌️Multiplayer: Play with your circle of friends, or join public rounds and connect with golf enthusiasts worldwide. Players can wager and win in-game currency, which cannot be transferred, exported, or redeemed for real-world value.

[media]

🏆 Competitive Play: Climb the ranks and compete globally on the GOLF+ TOUR, or go head to head in Battle mode.

[media]

✅ Real Golf Brands: Experience golf equipment from leading brands like Callaway, TaylorMade, and PXG.

[media]
📈 Performance Feedback: Advanced shot stats, strokes gained data, handicap system, and swing analyzer to help you understand and improve your game.

🎯 Diverse Modes: From Match Play to Skins, Weekly Challenges and Topgolf, we have an experience for every player.

🏞 GOLF+ Clubhouse: A place to practice, fine tune your clubs, and play fun mini-games.

🖥 Media Player: Seamlessly enjoy YouTube and other web media right on the course.
